column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=120284  Can anyone help? I've been trying to install Ubuntu for 14 hours in total :S
I found some old CD-Rs and they wouldnt work
They made a scratching noise when I tried to copy the iso
I tried one cd-r and it didn't work though
the I/O errors sound fishy too so i'm guessing it has something to do with either your cable or IDE controller. :/
edit /etc/apt/sources.list and remove all cd references. :)
get ready for some command line stuff then. :)
yeah... to be safe, don't delete them, just comment them out with a hash. :)
